mapper.insert:
insert into save_path (no, sub_problem_no, save_no, package_path) values
((select sp.no from save_path sp where sp.sub_problem_no = ${item.subProblemNo } and sp.save_no = ${item.saveNo }), ${item.subProblemNo }, ${item.saveNo }, '${item.packagePath }')
on duplicate key update sub_problem_no = values(sub_problem_no), save_no = values(save_no), package_path= values(package_path)

insert into code (no, save_path_no, language, code, file_name) values
((select c.no from code c where c.save_path_no = ${item.savePathNo } and c.language = '${item.language }' and c.file_name = '${item.fileName }'), ${item.savePathNo }, '${item.language }', '${item.code }', '${item.fileName}')
on duplicate key update save_path_no = values(save_path_no), language = values(language), code = values(code), file_name = values(file_name)
mapper.select: select no, save_path_no as savePathNo, language, code, file_name as fileName from code where save_path_no = (select no from save_path where sub_problem_no = #{subProblemNo })

choose.when: select count(*) from user u, save s, problem p where s.user_no = u.no and s.problem_no = p.no and s.user_no = #{authUserNo} and p.state ='y'
choose.otherwise: select count(*) from user u, save s, problem p,kind k where s.user_no = u.no and k.no = p.kind_no and s.problem_no = p.no and s.user_no = #{authUserNo} and p.state ='y' and (p.title like '%${keyword}%' or u.nickname like '%${keyword}%' or k.name like '%${keyword}%')

choose.when: select s.no as no, s.user_no as userNo, s.problem_no as problemNo, p.title as title, k.name as kind, u.nickname as nickname from save s, problem p, kind k, user u where s.user_no = #{authUserNo } and s.user_no = u.no and s.problem_no = p.no and p.kind_no = k.no and p.state ='y' order by s.no desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
choose.otherwise: select s.no as no, s.user_no as userNo, s.problem_no as problemNo, p.title as title, k.name as kind, u.nickname as nickname from save s, problem p, kind k, user u where s.user_no = #{authUserNo } and s.user_no = u.no and s.problem_no = p.no and p.kind_no = k.no and p.state ='y' and (p.title like '%${keyword}%' or u.nickname like '%${keyword}%' or k.name like '%${keyword}%' ) order by s.no desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

mapper.select: select s.no as no, s.user_no as userNo, s.problem_no as problemNo, p.title as title, k.name as kind, u.nickname as nickname from save s, user u, problem p, kind k where s.no = #{saveNo } and s.user_no = u.no and s.problem_no = p.no and p.kind_no = k.no

select c.no as no, c.save_path_no as savePathNo, c.language as language, c.code as code, c.file_name as fileName, sp.sub_problem_no as subProblemNo from code c, save_path sp where c.save_path_no = #{savePathNo } and c.save_path_no = sp.no
select no, title, contents, exam_input as examInput, exam_output as examOutput, problem_no as problemNo, state from sub_problem where problem_no = #{problemNo } and state = 'y'
